A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Horrible story and no character development. Sidelined and destroyed all the subplots from the previous movie\, which were all the reasons I wanted to see this one. They didn't even replace those subplots with better ones. I now have exactly zero fucks left to give for Episode 9: The Love Triangle. Half this movie revolves around shitting on the previous one\, while the other half focuses on destroying the Star Wars franchise. This movie does have beautifully shot scenes\, though. It's just too bad they weren't pretty enough to cover up all the plot holes.
